title: Theft
text: The misappropriation or taking of anything of value which belongs to another, either without the consent of the other or by means of fraudulent conduct, practices, or representations.

title: Aggravated Battery
text: A battery committed with a dangerous weapon.

title: First Degree Murder
text: The killing of a human being when the offender has specific intent to kill or to inflict great bodily harm and is engaged in certain enumerated felonies.
